languages.text: [Обратиться к Ирлиэт] "Разве ты не видишь? Каждый вдох и выдох твоего собрата пронизан скверной. Он лжет, юлит, кидается обвинениями — лишь бы спасти свою жалкую гнилую душонку. Убей его. Ты же хочешь спасти Лилэтан, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к Ирлиэт] "Разве ты не видишь? Каждый вдох и выдох твоего собрата пронизан скверной. Он лжет, юлит, кидается обвинениями — лишь бы спасти свою жалкую гнилую душонку. Убей его. Ты же хочешь спасти Лилэтан, не так ли?"

languages.text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к Ирлиэт] "Разве ты не видишь? Каждый вдох и выдох твоего собрата пронизан скверной. Он лжет, юлит, кидается обвинениями — лишь бы спасти свою жалкую гнилую душонку. Убей его. Ты же хочешь спасти Лилэтан, не так ли?"

[Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

[Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

[Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

languages.text: [对伊莉耶特开口]“难道你还没看到吗？你这位族人的每一口呼吸都充斥着腐化。他靠着谎言、指控与混淆视听，试图维持他那早已腐朽的渺小灵魂。杀了他吧。你渴望拯救莉莱赞，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: [对伊莉耶特开口]“难道你还没看到吗？你这位族人的每一口呼吸都充斥着腐化。他靠着谎言、指控与混淆视听，试图维持他那早已腐朽的渺小灵魂。杀了他吧。你渴望拯救莉莱赞，不是吗？”

languages.text: [Dirigirte a Yrliet] «¿Acaso no lo ves? Tu hermano respira corrupción. Recurre a mentiras, ofuscaciones y acusaciones solo para salvar su pútrida alma. Mátalo. Quieres salvar el Lilaethan, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a Yrliet] «¿Acaso no lo ves? Tu hermano respira corrupción. Recurre a mentiras, ofuscaciones y acusaciones solo para salvar su pútrida alma. Mátalo. Quieres salvar el Lilaethan, ¿no?».

languages.text: [ユリエットと話す]「知らないのか？同胞とやらが吸う息はいつだって腐っている。嘘と黒塗りと誹謗中傷が当たり前で、それは全部己の腐った小さな魂を守るためだ。ムアランを殺せ。リラエタンを救いたいのだろう？」
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: [ユリエットと話す]「知らないのか？同胞とやらが吸う息はいつだって腐っている。嘘と黒塗りと誹謗中傷が当たり前で、それは全部己の腐った小さな魂を守るためだ。ムアランを殺せ。リラエタンを救いたいのだろう？」

languages.text: [Yrliet ansprechen] "Seht Ihr es nicht? Jeder Atemzug Eures Volksgenossen ist durchsetzt von Verderbnis. Er lügt, verschleiert und beschuldigt – nur um seine kleine verdorbene Seele zu retten. Tötet ihn. Ihr wollt Lileath doch retten, oder?"
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: [Yrliet ansprechen] "Seht Ihr es nicht? Jeder Atemzug Eures Volksgenossen ist durchsetzt von Verderbnis. Er lügt, verschleiert und beschuldigt – nur um seine kleine verdorbene Seele zu retten. Tötet ihn. Ihr wollt Lileath doch retten, oder?"

languages.text: [Vous adresser à Yrliet] « Vous ne voyez donc pas que votre compatriote sent la corruption à plein nez ? Il ne fait que mentir et recouvrir la vérité d'un écran de fumée tout en accusant les autres, et tout cela uniquement pour sauver son âme gangrenée. Si vous voulez avoir une chance de sauver la lilaethan, vous devez le tuer. »
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à Yrliet] « Vous ne voyez donc pas que votre compatriote sent la corruption à plein nez ? Il ne fait que mentir et recouvrir la vérité d'un écran de fumée tout en accusant les autres, et tout cela uniquement pour sauver son âme gangrenée. Si vous voulez avoir une chance de sauver la lilaethan, vous devez le tuer. »

languages.text: [Yrliet'e dön] "Görüyor musun? Soydaşının aldığı her nefesten yozlaşma akıyor. Çürümeye yüz tutmuş ruhunu kurtarmak için yalan söylemekten, gerçeği saklamaktan ve başkalarını suçlamaktan başka çaresi yok. Öldür onu. Lilaethan'ı kurtarmak istemiyor musun yoksa?"
languages.original_text: [Address Yrliet] "Do you not see? Every breath your kinsman takes is riddled with corruption. He resorts to lies, obfuscations, and accusations — all to save his rotten little soul. Kill him. You want to save the Lilaethan, don't you?"
